main event: Mr. and Mrs. McDonald observed a strange white light over Phoenix, Arizona on June 30, 1952.
interesting points: The object appeared about 3/4 the size of the full moon and emitted a very bright white light,The object traveled downward at high speed before disappearing,The witnesses estimated the object's speed to be in excess of 1000 miles per hour,The sighting lasted approximately thirty seconds without any sound from the object,No other reports were received to confirm the observation.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. McDonald, who are described as being of average intelligence
